Articles.Content: It is? I've been thinking about the BF4 beta and GTA Online too much to notice
wow PC or XBOX because XBOX well...... not the best thing under the sun in my country.. Also ive been playing the droid version so PC went on the second rail
I have the mobile version,much better than pocket minecraft. I like the more adventure centric aspects of terraria as opposed to minecrafts goalless aspect

After four solid hours of running around screaming, I can report that the changes are drastic.

There is tungsten, platinum and lead ores ( i haven't found any traditional ores from the game yet. Although the NPC spawning logic seems to be skewed, the new biomes are insane, and somehow I have a magic mirror and a magic carpet that effectively negates fall damage and allows for much easier travel.

All in all it is ****ing insane.

I've found platinum, silver, tin, and lead, but not a bit of iron. Have a crimson biome that I've found so far.

The variations in the zombies is kinda cute, especially in the rain.

It's one hell of an update to be sure. The week I bought Terraria, redigit announced he was done with it, so nice to finally see an update.

I played the update too today, and it was certainly a whole new experience. Ice biomes, corrupted ice biomes, new crafting recipes, and more that I have even discovered yet. If anyone reading this hasn't bought Terraria yet, I would highly recommend trying it as it will provide you with literal days of fun.
Terraria became a whole new game with this update!
Can someone show a change log? I'm unable to find one.
I played it and its AWESOME, it's so different now, tungsten, platinum, lead ores.....
i was playing the crap out of the droid version :S
